name: Tech Workshop
description: Hands-on workshops on the latest tech trends and tools.
article: Tech workshops have become essential hubs for learning, collaboration, and innovation in today's fast-paced technological landscape. These interactive events bring together individuals with diverse backgrounds and skill sets to delve into emerging technologies, share knowledge, and tackle real-world challenges.

name: Networking Lounge
description: Relax and connect with fellow tech enthusiasts.

name: Exhibition Booths
description: Explore cutting-edge tech products and services.

name: Panel Discussions
description: Engage in insightful discussions with industry experts.

name: Hackathon
description: Compete in a coding competition and win prizes.

name: Startup Pitch
description: Discover innovative startups and their ideas.
